nodes.bodyText: Need to validate what a dependency exclusion does in a BOM.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
+# This file is generated automatically and any changes will be lost.
+
+resources:
+  repositories:
+    - repository: azure-sdk-build-tools
+      type: git
+      name: internal/azure-sdk-build-tools
+    - repository: azure-sdk-tools
+      type: github
+      name: Azure/azure-sdk-tools
+      endpoint: azure
+
+trigger:
+  branches:
+    include:
+      - master
+      - hotfix/*
+      - release/*
+  paths:
+    include:
+      - sdk/boms/azure-sdk-bom/
+
+pr:
+  branches:
+    include:
+      - master
+      - feature/*
+      - hotfix/*
+      - release/*
+  paths:
+    include:
+      - sdk/boms/azure-sdk-bom/
+
+stages:
+  - template: ../../eng/pipelines/azure-sdk-bom.yml
+    parameters:
+      ServiceDirectory: appconfiguration

nodes.bodyText: Looks like you can just delete this entire parameter for boms.

nodes.bodyText:
What about hooking up the signing and releasing parts of the pipeline? Do you intend to do that manually for now?
fyi @mitchdenny
